simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Implements the Noop command that insures the HS task is alive

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_HS_CMDPC - command counter will increment
The HS_NOOP_INF_EID informational event message will be generated when the command is received

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
Criticality
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Resets the HS housekeeping counters

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_HS_CMDPC - command counter will be cleared
$sc_$cpu_HS_CMDEC - command error counter will be cleared
$sc_$cpu_HS_EVTMonCnt - events monitored counter will be cleared
The HS_RESET_DBG_EID debug event message will be generated when the command is executed

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
Criticality
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Enables the Applications Monitor

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_HS_CMDPC - command counter will increment
$sc_$cpu_HS_AppMonState - will be set to Enabled
The HS_ENABLE_APPMON_DBG_EID informational event message will be generated when the command is executed

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
Criticality
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Disables the Applications Monitor

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_HS_CMDPC - command counter will increment
$sc_$cpu_HS_AppMonState - will be set to Disabled
The HS_DISABLE_APPMON_DBG_EID informational event message will be generated when the command is executed

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
Criticality
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Command Verification

Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_HS_CMDPC - command counter will increment

The HS_DISABLE_EVENTMON_DBG_EID informational event message will be generated when the command is executed

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Enables the Aliveness Indicator UART output

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_HS_CMDPC - command counter will increment
$sc_$cpu_HS_CPUAliveState - will be set to Enabled
The HS_ENABLE_ALIVENESS_DBG_EID informational event message will be generated when the command is executed

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
Criticality

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Disables the Aliveness Indicator UART output

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_HS_CMDPC - command counter will increment
$sc_$cpu_HS_CPUAliveState - will be set to Disabled
The HS_DISABLE_ALIVENESS_DBG_EID informational event message will be generated when the command is executed

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Resets the count of HS performed resets maintained by HS

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_HS_CMDPC - command counter will increment
$sc_$cpu_HS_PRResetCtr - will be set to 0
The HS_RESET_RESETS_DBG_EID informational event message will be generated when the command is executed

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
Criticality
simplesect.para: None

xrefdescription.para: Set Max Processor Resets Performed Count

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Sets the max allowable count of processor resets to the provided value

simplesect.title: Command Verification
simplesect.para:
Successful execution of this command may be verified with the following telemetry:
$sc_$cpu_HS_CMDPC - command counter will increment
$sc_$cpu_HS_MaxResetCnt - will be set to the provided value
The HS_SET_MAX_RESETS_DBG_EID informational event message will be generated when the command is executed

simplesect.title: Error Conditions
simplesect.para:
This command may fail for the following reason(s):
Command packet length not as expected

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
Criticality
simplesect.para: None

The HS_ENABLE_CPUHOG_DBG_EID informational event message will be generated when the command is executed

simplesect.title: Error Conditions

This command may fail for the following reason(s):

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:

simplesect.title: Error Conditions

This command may fail for the following reason(s):

simplesect.title: Evidence of failure may be found in the following telemetry:
